Just select <List of communities>, find the one that interests you, and click <Subscribe>. You can also unsubscribe by clicking <Unsubscribe>:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/561792ce-dd08-4126-b463-6ba627ab4ba6/4in.PNG\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":755,\"height\":337}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In addition, all employees receive a biweekly news digest in their email:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5e003ad1-4d79-40fa-b842-9d40b4f771ea/image2017-11-1%2015:1:7.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":348,\"height\":492.99999999999994}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Don't miss important events in the lives of the company and your colleagues – read, discuss, and suggest ideas for articles. You are the main source of EPAM news.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For questions regarding publication in Infoportal, please address the team at\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:infoportal@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ORG Internal Communications Board\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Follow our company on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.facebook.com/EPAM.Ukraine/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Facebook\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=2326231&trk=group-name\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Linkedin\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
